content.text:
# 2025 Queensland International II – Men's singles

Adam Walton
| runner   =  Jason Kubler
| score    = 7–6(8–6), 7–6(7–4)
| edition  =
| before_year  = 2025
| before_name  = Queensland International
| main_name  = Queensland International
| after_name  = Queensland International III
| after_year  = 2025
}}
Tristan Schoolkate was the defending champion but lost in the first round to Jason Kubler.
Adam Walton won the title after defeating Kubler 7–6(8–6), 7–6(7–4) in the final.
Seeds
Adam Walton (champion)
#  Tristan Schoolkate (first round)
#  Alex Bolt (first round)
#  Li Tu (quarterfinals)
#  Yuta Shimizu (quarterfinals)
#  Omar Jasika (semifinals)
#  Bernard Tomic (first round)
#  James McCabe (quarterfinals)
}}
